name: Little Dog Walk
description: This is just a short little game where you walk your dog in a dog park, with a pastel city behind you. This was the first ever game I've written that's been hand coded. It was the first in a series of 5 'games' created for my semester one, year one studies at RMIT university.  Unfortunately, this game can only be played in the browser and with a computer. Please don't download it and modify the files, or post as your own. Thank you and I hope you enjoy!
